nodes.text: Bladder-bugs were a type of hissing insect that lived in the forests and canyons of the planet Akiva.

While on Kashyyyk, Norra Wexley, a native of Akiva, contrasted how the forests of Kashyyyk were silent after the Galactic Empire's devastation, whereas the Canyon of Akar on her homeworld was loud with the sounds of ateles, clever-birds, and bladder-bugs.
